Burstly Android System

Packages
com.burstly.conveniencelayer Contains Convience Layer (CL) classes.
com.burstly.conveniencelayer.events Contains CL related events.
com.burstly.lib  
com.burstly.lib.apptracking Package contains application install tracker.
com.burstly.lib.cache Cache abstraction.
com.burstly.lib.component Package contains interfaces and abstractions for different types of ad components.
com.burstly.lib.component.activitylauncher Package contains interstitial launcher.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent Package contains 3-rd party libs implementations of IBurstlyAdaptor interface.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.admob Package contains AdMob implementation of IAdaptorController interface.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly Package contains native burstly ads implementations.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html  
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.mraid  
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.ormma Package contains ORMMA JavaScript bridge implementations.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.ormma.listener Package contains ORMMA listeners implementation.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.ormma.util Package contains ORMMA utility classes.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.html.rewards Rewards related API.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.video  
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.burstly.wrapper Package contains wrappers.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.greystripe Package contains GreyStripe implementation of IBurstlyAdaptor interface.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.inmobi Package contains native InMobi ads implementations.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.jumptap Package contains native JumpTap ads implementations.
com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent.millennial Package contains Millenial implementation of IBurstlyAdaptor interface.
com.burstly.lib.component.preinitialize Package contains "preinitialization" manager that controls external adaptors preinitialization.
com.burstly.lib.constants Package contains Burstly SDK constants.
com.burstly.lib.currency Package contains currency feature implementation.
com.burstly.lib.currency.request Package contains currency feature requests implementation.
com.burstly.lib.currency.secured Package contains currency secured request implementation.
com.burstly.lib.debugging Package contains application debugging components.
com.burstly.lib.downloadtracker Package contains custom download tracking manager and request-response objects.
com.burstly.lib.exception Package contains custom burstly exception handlers.
com.burstly.lib.feature Containg main configuration classes.
com.burstly.lib.feature.apptracker  
com.burstly.lib.feature.currency  
com.burstly.lib.feature.debug  
com.burstly.lib.feature.dtracker  
com.burstly.lib.feature.networks  
com.burstly.lib.network Package contains network request-response objects.
com.burstly.lib.network.beans Package contains system POJO classes that are used to map each request type to proper java representation.
com.burstly.lib.network.beans.cookie Package contains classes relates to cookie management.
com.burstly.lib.network.request Package contains AsyncTask used in project.
com.burstly.lib.persistance Package contains classes that handles persistance for BurstlyView instance.
com.burstly.lib.persistance.preferences Package contains preferences implementations.
com.burstly.lib.persistance.preferences.db Package contains classes for database based preferences implementation.
com.burstly.lib.persistance.preferences.file Package contains classes for file based preferences implementation.
com.burstly.lib.service Package contains various services for sdk.
com.burstly.lib.ui Package contains BurstlyView components that houses every Ad type.
com.burstly.lib.util Provides convinient util methods.
com.burstly.lib.util.annotation Support annotations.
com.burstly.lib.util.calendar Provides support for manipulating with Calendar.
com.burstly.lib.util.json Provides JSON processing classes: processor factory, common interface and processor class(-es).
